TEXT: The applicant is an NORP national , born in DATE and living in GPE ) .
He is represented before the ORG by Mr PERSON , a lawyer practising in GPE ( GPE ) .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .
The applicant is the owner of a small company ( “ LOC snc di PERSON ” ) which deals in aeroplanes and relevant spare parts .

In DATE and DATE , the applicant purchased a plot of land in the vicinity of the Guidonia airport with a view to building a hangar on it . There being no fences around the plot of land , its boundaries in respect of the Guidonia airport were not marked .
In DATE , the applicant 's company obtained a building permit from the Guidonia town council for building the hangar .
On DATE , the town council informed the applicant that his building permit had been suspended , as ORG claimed to be the legitimate owner of the plot of land .
The proceedings against ORG

As a consequence , on DATE the applicant applied to ORG , in order to have his right of property on the plot of land at issue acknowledged and the relevant boundary assessed . By a decision of CARDINAL DATE , ORG dismissed the case for lack of jurisdiction .

By a writ served on DATE , the applicant summoned ORG to appear before ORG , which , by a judgment of DATE , acknowledged the applicant 's right of property on the plot of land and assessed the relevant boundary . The court however refused the applicant ’s request to mark the boundaries of the plot of land , on the ground that , given that ORG had de facto decided to use the plot of land as a part of the airport , the marking of boundaries would have influenced this decision , which was outside the scope of jurisdiction of a civil court ( the administrative courts being exclusively competent to withdraw or amend an administrative decision ) .
The appeal lodged on DATE by ORG against this decision was rejected by ORG of appeal by a judgment issued on DATE and filed with ORG DATE .
The appeal on points of law lodged by ORG against the appellate court ’s decision was rejected by ORG by a judgment issued on DATE and filed with ORG on DATE .
The proceedings to recover possession of the plot of land
In the meantime , ORG had let the applicant 's plot of land to a farmer , PERSON
In DATE , the applicant instituted civil proceedings ( azione di reintegrazione ) against PERSON , in order to recover possession of his property .
By an interlocutory decision of CARDINAL DATE , ORG ordered PERSON to vacate the plot of land .

The proceedings were then pursued at the hearing of DATE . An expertise was carried out . ORG intervened in the proceedings claiming to have authorised PERSON to occupy the plot of land ; it claimed further that the proceedings could not be
pursued against a ORG administration .

On DATE the bailiff appointed by ORG in order to enforce the latter 's decision of CARDINAL DATE requested ORG to vacate the applicant 's plot of land ; the commanding officer refused on the ground that no relevant orders had been given by his senior officers .

By a judgment of DATE , filed with ORG on DATE , the ORG refused the applicant ’s claims , withdrew its own interlocutory decision of CARDINAL DATE and ordered the applicant to refund the GPE legal costs .
On DATE the applicant ’s company summoned ORG to appear before ORG with a view to being compensated for the financial losses incurred on account of the occupation of its plot of land .

By a judgment of DATE , ORG ruled in the applicant ’s company ’s favour and ordered ORG to pay the applicant ’s company the sum of MONEY for pecuniary damage in connection with the occupation of the plot of land .
